name: Howmanydaystillyournextcruise
0:
”Alexa, open time too cruise”
”Alexa, start time too cruise”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: time too cruise
des:
Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until your departure. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
